block.p: $447,000 303 Mercer Street (Waverly Place) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, 11-ft. ceilings, renovated kitchen, 8 windows, whirlpool bath, walk-in closet, hardwood floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $982, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $449,000, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$447,000 303 Mercer Street (Waverly Place) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, 11-ft. ceilings, renovated kitchen, 8 windows, whirlpool bath, walk-in closet, hardwood floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $982, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $449,000, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$2.74 million 521 West 23rd Street 6-bedroom, 4-bath, 3,820-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; dining area, renovated kitchen, whirlpool in master bath, high ceilings, 1/2 private roof rights, Hudson River view; common charge $1,205, taxes $15,770; listed at $3.1 million, 14 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$550,000 200 East 24th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen, dining area, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,308, 62% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$625,000 40 East 61st Street 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,242-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, entry foyer, high ceilings, hardwood floors, south exposure; common charge $1,054, taxes $7,812; listed at $645,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$845,000 1991 Broadway (66th Street) (Bel Canto) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,224-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, hardwood floors, 556-sq.-ft. terrace, 2 exposures; common charge $1,438, taxes $7,848; listed at $825,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group; Halstead Property Co.)

$999,999 20 Hawkins Street Two attached houses on the same lot with waterfront sold to the same purchaser; 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 20-year-old contemporary-style house with den and fireplace and 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old ranch with eat-in kitchen, home office and rear deck; 3 garages, 100-by-100-ft. lot with waterfront on Eastchester Bay; taxes $6,250; listed at $1.2 million, 3 years on market (broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

$365,000 29 Tiffany Place 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 930-sq.-ft. condo in a recently renovated prewar warehouse; dining area, high ceilings, hardwood floors, parking space, 2 common terraces and garden; common charge $446, 100% tax-abated; listed at $375,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

$1.125 million 586 5th Street 3-family, 4-story brownstone; 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, double parlor, den, redwood deck in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, dining area in upper floor simplexes; original moldings and detail in each; south garden, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,700; listed at $1.125 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Garfield Realty)

$480,000 138-28 78th Road 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 55-year-old, detached brick colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, den, finished basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,666; listed at $540,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: ReMax/F.H. Realty)

$570,000 5 Hamlin Court 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, newly constructed colonial; 2-story foyer, breakfast room, dining room, family room, home office, rear deck, 2-car garage, 1.6-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $579,000, 1 year on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)

$870,000 83 Kings Highway 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 91-year-old colonial; breakfast room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, central air-conditioning, 2-car garage, 0.55-acre lot; taxes $6,457; listed at $889,000, 9 weeks on market (brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Camelot Realty)
